statements: SELECT * FROM ClothingInventory;
SELECT item_name, category FROM ClothingInventory WHERE size='M';
SELECT category, color, quantity FROM ClothingInventory WHERE category='Shoes';
SELECT item_name, size, color FROM ClothingInventory WHERE color='Blue' AND quantity > 0;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM ClothingInventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClothingInventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, category, color FROM ClothingInventory WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY category, item_name DESC;
SELECT size, count(*) AS num_items FROM ClothingInventory GROUP BY size ORDER BY num_items DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, color, quantity FROM ClothingInventory WHERE category = 'Shirt' AND size = 'M';
SELECT category, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM ClothingInventory GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(quantity) > 10 ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM clothing_items;
SELECT * FROM inventory_logs WHERE log_type = 'IN';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM clothing_items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE item_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, log_type, log_date FROM clothing_items JOIN inventory_logs ON clothing_items.id = inventory_logs.item_id WHERE log_type = 'IN' ORDER BY log_date DESC;

SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity_changed) AS total_quantity_changed FROM clothing_items JOIN inventory_logs ON clothing_items.id = inventory_logs.item_id GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity_changed > 0;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE id IN (SELECT item_id FROM inventory_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01') ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT item_name, item_price, quantity_in_stock FROM clothing_items WHERE item_category = 'Shoes';
SELECT order_id, item_id, supplier_id, order_date, quantity_ordered FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items ORDER BY item_id DESC, item_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE item_price > 50 ORDER BY item_price DESC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC

SELECT orders.order_id, clothing_items.item_name, suppliers.supplier_name, orders.quantity_ordered FROM orders INNER JOIN clothing_items ON orders.item_id = clothing_items.item_id INNER JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE orders.quantity_ordered >= 20 ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC
SELECT item_category, SUM(quantity_in_stock) AS total_stock FROM clothing_items GROUP BY item_category HAVING total_stock > 100 ORDER BY total_stock DESC
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM clothing_items ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount, customer_id FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items WHERE item_category = 'Shirts';
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity_in_stock > 10 ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, orders.total_amount, customers.customer_name FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, size, color, unit_price FROM clothing_items;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_email, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT order_date, customer_name, shipping_address, total_amount FROM orders;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity, current_inventory FROM warehouses;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type, item_id, quantity_changed FROM transactions;
SELECT item_name, item_category, size, color, unit_price FROM clothing_items WHERE color='Red' ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT warehouse_name, location, current_inventory FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY warehouse_name ASC
SELECT t.transaction_date, t.quantity_changed, c.item_name FROM transactions t JOIN clothing_items c ON t.item_id = c.item_id WHERE warehouse_id = 1 ORDER BY t.quantity_changed DESC
